column4: does anyone know if there is a small, neat onscreen keyboard app that just displays what buttons im pressing? I dont want a full blown touch typing teachme type program, just summit simple
you can enable on an on-screen keyboard in accessibility options, then you would have a reference point if that's what you are looking for.
im running fluxbox
gtkeyboard
no such command or package
sudo apt-get install gtkeyboard
E: Couldn't find package gtkeyboard
do you have a "control center" entry on your menus - look for accesibility
xmag and GOK, but i need to log out for GOK to work.. really dont want to log out
not sure what to tell you.
tell me to log out probably :)
what was the problem with gtkeyboard?
it wants me to log out before it will workk
why problem logging out (not shut down)
takes too long, and I dont want to have to restart firefox and my terminal... guess im being a bit pedantic?
Okay :)
